text: Well basically, Hiro is a digital journalism student.
But most of his time was spent learning about technology, rather than journalism.
So, his grades in class were just enough to pass.
Oh, he also really likes playing games, especially anime gacha games.
And some realistic First-Person Shooter games, I don't know why.
Maybe because his passion for firearms?
Well, atleast don't ask me why I call him Hiro. He just don't want me reveal his real name.
